definition: disconnected/interrupted/suspended/a gap/a break
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: This study provide in-depth analysis on the North American market for three-phase uninterruptible power supplies (UPS).
sentences.chinese: 本報告深入分析北美市場三相不間斷電源供應情況。

sentences.english: Often appear these days giddy and disgusting, this kind of symptom is discontinuity .
sentences.chinese: 最近幾天老是出現頭暈噁心，這種症狀是間斷性的。

sentences.english: Get uninterrupted 8 hours sleep each night.
sentences.chinese: 每晚8小時的不間斷睡眠。

sentences.english: Gloom golems howl incessantly but do not communicate.
sentences.chinese: 深黯魔像會不間斷地嚎叫，但無法進行交流。

sentences.english: Experimental comparison was also made between the continuous bubble method and the intermittent bubble method of diazomethane.
sentences.chinese: 對重氮甲烷連續鼓泡法和間斷鼓泡法進行了試驗對比。

sentences.english: In printing, to separate continuous-form paper into discrete sheets using a burster.
sentences.chinese: 末端連在一起以使形成不間斷的整體。

sentences.english: We have had a continuous presence in the Mainland for more than 135 years.
sentences.chinese: 我們在中國內地的業務從未間斷，已超過了135年。

sentences.english: The weathering layer is an obvious index for sedimentary discontinuity and change of environment.
sentences.chinese: 風化層是沉積間斷和環境變遷的明顯標誌。

sentences.english: We have always been able to supply these firms with their monthly requirements without interruption.
sentences.chinese: 我方始終能供給這些公司每月所需的數量，從無間斷。

sentences.english: Thermopsis is one of the few genera within Fabaceae with the distribution pattern of the East Asia North American disjunction.
sentences.chinese: 黃華屬是豆科少數幾個東亞北美間斷分佈屬之一。

sentences.english: It spots in London in Spring.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦的春天總是下間斷性的小雨。

sentences.english: At night send out the signal for rescue continously to the direction for rescue with the flashlight.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚用手電筒，向求救方向不間斷的發射求救信號。

sentences.english: The unknown displacement field is approximated by discontinuous , piecewisely differentiable functions.
sentences.chinese: 用間斷分片可微的函數來近似未知位移場。

sentences.english: The series of wars fought intermittently between France and England.
sentences.chinese: 法國和英國間的一系列間斷性戰爭。
強大的設備和不間斷的訪問。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of high-vacuum discontinuous suction technique for treatment of decubitus ulcers.
sentences.chinese: 目的應用高負壓間斷吸引技術治療嚴重壓瘡。
